text: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 63. Should any bhikkhu knowingly agitate for the reviving of an issue that has been rightfully dealt with, it is to be confessed.
๖๓. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใด รู้อยู่ฟื้นอธิกรณ์ที่ทําเสร็จแล้วตามธรรม เพื่อทําอีก เป็นปาจิตตีย์
63. Should any bhikkhu, knowing that a legal process has been disposed of according to what is righteous, agitate for it to be carried out again, it entails expiation.
